title: Textile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound cloth, brocaded
dimensions:
a) Warp x Weft: 74 x 54.5 cm (29 1/8 x 21 7/16 in.)
b) Warp x Weft: 66.5 x 32.8 cm (26 3/16 x 12 15/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
description: Ground striped vertically with extra warp, white satin and white horizontal ribbing. Red satin border stripes on either side. Large floral sprays brocaded in red, green, and brown silks. Component A has both selvages present. Component B has right selvage present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: compound cloth, brocaded. Gift of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt. 1931-44-3-a,b.
